item.title: About
item.content:encoded:
Who We Are

Hey, We are Zenith, a marketing agency specializing in home improvements and services. I started this business after a failed business attempt of starting my own home improv company. I did not market it well and gave up nd never looked back.

I then went ahead and tried graphic design and turns out I am really good at it. That is also when I found out about marketing and Zenith was born.

We now have found clients to work with but we still are new in this business.
